akn:section.akn:heading: Statistical Abstract of the United States

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1343. Statistical Abstract of the United States In addition to the usual number of the Statistical Abstract of the United States, twelve thousand copies shall be printed: three thousand for the Senate, six thousand for the House of Representatives, and three thousand for distribution by the Secretary of Commerce. (Pub. L. 90–620, Oct. 22, 1968, 82 Stat. 1273.)
Historical and Revision NotesBased on 44 U.S. Code, 1964 ed., § 291 (Jan. 12, 1895, ch. 23, § 73, 28 Stat. 616; Aug. 23, 1912, ch. 350, § 1, 37 Stat. 407; 1950 Reorg. Plan No. 5, §§ 1, 2, eff. May 24, 1950, 15 F.R. 3174, 64 Stat. 1263).
